description: The Onmitsukidou, or Stealth Forces, are a special group of shinigami who act like the secret police, counterintelligence, and espionage group of Soul Society. They are tasked with surveillance, covert operations, and imprisoning potentially problematic shinigami. This group is traditionally led by the captain of the Ni-Ban Tai of the Gotei-13.
name: Onmitsu Kidou
